channel.title: GitHub Actions on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub Actions on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Improving your GitHub Profile
item.description: Improve your GitHub profile with these tips. Learn how to create a repository with your username, add stats, coding skills, preferred IDEs, blog stats, and more. Customize your profile to make it engaging and showcase your skills and interests effectively.

item.title: Using GitHub Actions to Build your Hugo Website
item.description: Learn to build Hugo websites using GitHub Actions and deploy them with Netlify. This guide covers setting up GitHub Actions to build your site, install dependencies, render Rmarkdown files, and deploy to Netlify or GitHub Pages. Enhanced control and maintenance for your site, with step-by-step instructions.
